comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 25605096@N08
comment._content:
I know exactly where this man is buried in Keene, NH as well as where he was when he died and what his last words were. I have however, never dreamed that I could put a face to his story! This is amazing! Is there any way I could get a high rez version of his photograph?
-Matt

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content: Hi Matt - Yes, all of our photos have been scanned at 600 dpi and are available at much higher resolutions than Flickr displays. Email me at bjwahl at ci.keene.nh.us and I can email you one, or if you are in town, you can bring a disk in and we can give you an even larger file.
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos
